name: Ghost of Dragon
description:
Ghost of Dragon is a Semi-Idle RPG game. Players can recruit heroes, collect soul cards, capture monster powers, craft equipment and defeat vicious creatures. Special visitors can be attracted and promoted to unlock unique features for the town, and they will further support players’ choice of play styles.

Game Features

  • 15 Hero Classes: each class provides a unique set of skill and tactic. A vast variety of exclusive soul cards can be collected to further enhance and modify hero powers. Player will even be able to modify a tank hero into a DPS one, or a DPS hero into a supportive one, so to allow this high level of flexibilities to help assembling a unique and powerful battle team.

  • 6 Major Elements: heroes can utilize up to 6 major elements to further customize powers. By making use of Ice that provides crowd control benefits, Gu that controls venomous creatures, Flame that deals blast damage, or Arcane that allows field control advantages for other team members, heroes will be able to exert an extra layer of influence towards powerful foes.

  • Highly flexible and versatile itemization system: randomized item attributes + over 100 unique effects + embed system that allows precise attribute modification, all these translates into a highly flexible craft system.

  • Real Time-Based Command battle system: During battles, heroes automatically perform actions when their skills’ Cooling-Down is ready, and players can unleash powerful tactics at any time by spending ‘Yin Yang Points’. This frees players from micromanaging teams and allows fast paced and intense battle fights!

  • Monster Power Capture: all monster powers in Ghost of Dragon can be captured into tokens, which can then be embedded into seals and equipped by heroes. Players will be able to hunt dungeons for rare and unique monsters and powers!

  • Visitor System: players can attract various unique visitors to reside in town, promote them and receive powerful supporting features. These features can significantly change the way town functions. For instance, a Stableman can introduce secret levels and improve logistic efficiency, a Businessman can expand shop inventory and improve income, a Kitchen Lady can turn ingredients into delicious dishes that empower heroes for dungeon crawling, and an Alchemist can craft medicines. There are even mysterious visitors such as Whizz Baby that claims to be able to predict future, and Cat of Doom that provides secretive services for heroes.
